name: Me & My Bugs
description:
"Me & My Bugs" is a tamagochi-like about centipedes! A little game made for studies with procedural animation and maths.

Controls:

  • Mouse Wheel: Zoom Controll;
  • Move mouse and press right button: Move camera;
  • Shift + Left button: Create some mushrooms (food);
  • Alt + Left button: Smash your centipede (Why?);
  • Left button: Call your centipede;
  • Mouse hover: pet your centipede.
